title: Operation Skywatch
log: Patrolled Zone 7 for 6 hours. Detected minor radar activity near grid C5. No engagement. Weather was clear. Returned to base safely.

title: Recon Sweep Delta
log: Drone conducted deep surveillance over Sector 9. Captured high-res images of unidentified structure. No hostile activity. Data uploaded to command.

title: Night Hawk Escort
log: Escorted cargo UAV to Forward Post Echo. Encountered low-flying bird flock. No deviations. Landed without incident. Fuel levels optimal.

title: Red Dagger
log: Response to GPS jamming in eastern airspace. Triangulated source, relayed to ground teams. Temporary signal restored. Mission marked as partial success.

title: Stormstrike
log: Mission delayed due to electrical storm. Performed low-altitude check of radar station Alpha-2 once weather cleared. Radar found intact. Logged power fluctuations.
